pharmacist

Class RxManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.Window
      • pharmacist.RxManager

  • public class RxManager
extends Window
    When the application starts, an instance of this class is created first. It provides a login window for user to enter their credential (username and password). Upon successful authentication, an instance of PrescriptionListViewer is created.
    Author:
    Khai Nguyen
